title: Owlnest Sleep Aid Lamp: The Art of Deep Sleep
subtitle: Simulating natural sunset to support your circadian rhythm. ITRI-certified spectrum technology.
description: After 3 years of R&D, we are bringing the serenity of dusk back to your bedroom. Join our community to shape the revolution of rest.
notice: Pre-launch: Final pricing and rewards revealed at launch.

faq.q: How does the sunset simulation work?
faq.a: Owlnest shifts color temperature over 30 minutes, transitioning from warm reading light to a deep, blue-free amber glow, mimicking natural dusk.

faq.q: How do I join the Discord community?
faq.a: Our Discord is a private space for verified owners. Purpose: protect community quality & backer co-creation. Access is unlocked AFTER you receive your product by verifying your unique Product Key in the Member Portal.
Yes, we plan to ship to select regions including US, UK, EU, and Taiwan. Specific shipping costs will be confirmed at launch.
All Kickstarter rewards are expected to come with a standard 1-year limited warranty covering manufacturing defects.
